subject: Theorize come checkout our selection of SL.U.TS in your area
body: "All right, population thirty thousand," Jason said. "Now how about surface control of your planet? I was surprised to find out that this city within its protective wall-the perimeter-is the only one on the planet. Let's not consider the mining camps, since they are obviously just extensions of the city. Would you say then that you people control more or less of the planet's surface than you did in the past?"
